alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 9:27PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT LOUISA...NORTHEASTERN CUMBERLAND...GOOCHLAND...NORTHWESTERN CAROLINE...NORTHWESTERN HANOVER...NORTHWESTERN POWHATAN AND FLUVANNA COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM EDT... At 926 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers and thunderstorms over Columbia, or near Fork Union, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Columbia around 930 PM EDT. Hadensville and Kents Store around 935 PM EDT. Mineral around 950 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Chilesburg, Orchid, Three Square, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Whiteville, West View, Grays Siding, Nancy Wrights Corner, and Wares Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
